artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō; Printer: Ono Gintarō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: 昭和七年十二月 {Shōwa shichinen jūnigatsu} (December 1932)
markings: red artist's seal: 深水 {Shinsui}; publisher seal: 渡辺木版美術画舖工作 {Watanabe mokuhan bijutsu gaho kōsaku} (produced by Watanabe woodblock print art store); printer seal: 摺師　斧銀太郎 {surishi Ono Gintarō} (printer Ono Gintarō) | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第八拾番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai hachijū ban} (edition of 250, number 80)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Second Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai nishū 現代美人集第二輯)
text: One of the most expensive prints in Watanabe's 1935 catalog: 25 Yen. This is a later edition from around 1940 judging by the carver seal and the publisher seal.
title: Snowstorm
